writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel parcel, int flags)

isLocationAvailable().Description: Returns true if the device location is known and reasonably up to date within the hints requested by the active @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationRequest_E@s. Failure to determine location may result from a number of causes including disabled location settings or an inability to retrieve sensor data in the device's environment.

Returns: true if the intent contains a @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationAvailability_E@, false otherwise.
hasLocationAvailability(android.content..Description: Returns true if an Intent contains a @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationAvailability_E@. This is a utility function that can be called from inside an intent receiver to make sure the received intent contains location availability data.

Returns: a @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationAvailability_E@, or null if the Intent doesn't contain this data.
extractLocationAvailability(android.cont.Description: Extracts the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationAvailability_E@ from an Intent. This is a utility function which extracts the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationAvailability_E@ from the extras of an Intent that was sent in response to a location request.

ClassDesc: Status on the availability of location data
